attributes.action: Release a joint, cross-party statement condemning recent post-referendum racism.
attributes.background:
We the undersigned call on all UK politicians to release a joint statement condemning the recently-reported racism following the UK EU Referendum.

A united message across all parties, ages and backgrounds needs be presented, as the actions of a few should not jeopardise the freedom of all.

rejection.details: This petition calls on political parties, not the Government or Parliament, to take action.
